name: EKSource
desc: An abstract superclass that represents the account a calendar belongs to.

items.name: var sourceIdentifier: String
items.desc: A unique identifier for the source object.

items.name: var sourceType: EKSourceType
items.desc: The type of this source object.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The name of this source object.

items.name: func calendars(for: EKEntityType) -> Set<EKCalendar>
items.desc: Returns the calendars that belong to this source object that support a particular entity type.

items.name: enum EKEntityType
items.desc: The type of entities allowed for a source.
